Articles.Content:
I have a bit of a wish list for features.  I would like to see:

  • Auto-staging: This would allow for time delays inside of stages, or conditionally make the craft remove the next stage at the current stage's completion.  Adding auto-staging would create better autonomy in getting into orbit +/- other planets.
  • More RTG options.  The small PB-NUK is great in a pinch, but there should be more of them.
  • A "Remove Object" button that will allow you to jettison parts in space.  One reason this would be helpful is to cut down on weight as needed.  Also, I removed a mod and I used a part from that mod on one of my ships, so after restarting my game, I was dismayed to see that all of my ships were gone because of "missing or unknown parts".

I will add to this a bit, so please follow this discussion
